title: The Inside view
creator_credit: London Television Service, Richard Reisz and Edward Poulter
brief_description: Illustrates the medical advances taking place which allow us literally to look inside the human body. There are various methods, all operable by way of the computer. An image of a living foetus inside the womb can be created and early heart trouble or cancer growth can be detected.
